category1.title: Security invitation link

permissionModal.title: Please recommend a bot in Koreanlist
permissionModal.description:
To customize the invitation link,
Vote NGuard Security Bot in Koreanlist, or
You must join the paid plan.

Koreanlist vote can be vote again every 12 hours.

modal.created: The invitation link has been applied.
modal.deleted: The invitation link has been deleted.
